Rewards Rate: 5% Rewards (FPs) on Spends at IndianOil Outlets, Groceries, and Bill Payments. 1 FP/₹150 Spent on Other Purchases, Including UPI Spends
Reward Redemption: Fuel Points redeemable for Free Fuel using the complimentary IndianOil XTRAREWARDS Program (IXRP) membership at IndianOil outlets (1 FP = 96 Paise), through net-banking towards catalog products (1 FP = 20 Paise) and as cashback on the credit card (1 FP = 20 Paise)

fees_charges.Spend-Based Waiver: Renewal Fee on Annual Spends of ₹50,000
fees_charges.Fuel Surcharge: 1% Waiver Across All Petrol Pumps on a Minimum Transaction of ₹400. Maximum Waiver of ₹250 Each Statement Cycle
fees_charges.Cash Advance Charges: 2.5% of the amount withdrawn subject to a minimum charge of Rs 500.

product_details: Renewal fee waiver on annual spends of Rs 50,000 and above in the previous year.
5% of spends as Fuel Points at IndianOil outlets, groceries, and bill payments.
1 Fuel Point on every Rs 150 spent on all other purchases.
Up to 50 liters of free fuel annually using an IndianOil HDFC Bank credit card.
A fuel surcharge of 1% is waived on all fuel transactions at all fuel stations across India.
